CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​SearchIndex.​Entry
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​SearchIndex.​Entry
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​SearchIndex.​KeywordEntry
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​SearchIndex.​TopicEntry

A base class for all entries in the search index.

Functions
Entry
public Entry ()
Normalize
static public string Normalize (
string text
)

Converts a string to a standardized form that's easier to search.

  • Text is converted to lowercase.

  • Whitespace is condensed.

  • Spaces that don't separate alphanumeric and underscore characters are removed.

  • Separators are normalized with NormalizeSeparatorsOnly().

  • Leading separators are removed.

NormalizeSeparatorsOnly
static public string NormalizeSeparatorsOnly (
string text
)

Converts all separators to a standardized form that's easier to search.  If you called Normalize() there is no need to call this as well.

  • :: and -> are converted to . regardless of what the language's member operator is.  It also doesn't matter if they appear in non-code topics or not.

  • \ is converted to / regardless of what the platform's path separator is.  It also doesn't matter if they appear in non-file topics or not.
